name: sql-transformer
description: SQL Transformer/formatter to enhance clarity and productivity
author: Roberto <@robertoleap>

sqlTransformer.blockComments.description: Set this to true to enable block comments (/* ,,, */) and false for line comments (-- ...). Default: true

sqlTransformer.outcomeComments.description: Set this to true to enable inclusion of '/* Outcome */' comments at the final select query based WITH CTE. Enabling this allows for expanding/collapsing the final query via the VSCode margin. Default: true

sqlTransformer.startingWidth.description: This is the starting margin width for queries. Default: 5

sqlTransformer.whereOneOne.description: Set this to true to enable 'WHERE 1=1' filter on queries. This is helpful for enabling rapid commenting/uncommenting the first filter. Default: true
